name: Crimson Sun
description:
A very short visual novel made in one week for O2A2 (only one of any asset) game jam.

Synopsis:

You wake up finding yourself imprisoned in a strange village, the only one who visit you a boy. Make the right choice to escape and avoid death.

Feature: One Sprite, One background, One thousand words.

Team:

-Saitoki:  Story, sprite and BG arts, coding

-Kusoneko:  Proofreader 

-Music by RP-Music

-SFX from Soundbible
